name: Six N Five x Avant Arte - Rituals

metadata.name: Rituals #1/20
metadata.description:
Rituals is a meditative piece that invites our imagination to explore this utopian sanctuary, perhaps the product of a dream, or a reality from now on. With different routes and corners that can be explored at the observer's desire, it proposes a moment to know a little more about ourselves or simply to escape from our ordinary tasks, at least for a moment.  
 
A quiet place between clouds, where the sun kindly touches the walls according to its will and the moonlight dictates the rhythms of the nightfall. Where stories are told by the voice of our imagination and the melody of the waves seems to dance in a majestic ritual, repeated day after day. Like our routines, but also like our rituals.
